eu.casoftworks.jdroidlib.commands

Class Command

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.casoftworks.jdroidlib.commands.Command
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICommand
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdbCommand, FastbootCommand

    public class Command
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICommand
    Abstract class implementing ICommand.java This class provides methods for creating the different types of commands used in and by JDroidLib.
    Author:
    Simon Cahill

      • getCommandTag

        public final java.lang.String getCommandTag()
        Gets the command tag. The command tag (dubbed so by me) is the name of the command. For example: $ ls -la Command tag: ls Command args: -la
        Specified by:

      • getDevice

        public Device getDevice()
        Gets the device this command should be executed upon. This may be null for server-wide commands!
        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • getTimeout

        public final long getTimeout()
        Gets the custom timeout for this command. This can be useful when the library-wide timeout is not sufficient.
        Specified by:
        getTimeout in interface ICommand
        Returns:
        The timeout for this command in ms.
